hero.title: Ratopia’s Core Principles
hero.subtitle: These values guide every pairing decision we make and every conversation we have.

body.text: Ratopia’s rattery philosophy consists of three core modules—Husbandry, Medical Care, and Breeding—plus a dedicated Q&A. Husbandry covers space, enrichment, feeding, and stress management; Medical Care emphasizes restraint under uncertainty and rejects overtreatment; Breeding is built on records and risk control and avoids extreme selection. The Q&A addresses common controversies and clarifies boundaries and responsibility. Together, these parts form Ratopia’s practical, testable framework.
